<<<<<<< HEAD
A short summary of the principal controversies between the Church of England, and the church of Rome being a vindication of several Protestant doctrines, in answer to a late pamphlet intituled, Protestancy destitute of Scripture-proofs. Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
[10], 150, [4] p.
Printed for Richard Chiswell ..., London : 1687.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Attributed to William Sherlock. cf. NUC pre-1956. Table of contents: p. [3]-[10] Errata: p. [10] Advertisement: p. [1]-[4] at end.
=======
